entry.title: How to be Good at Persona 5
entry.content:
There are a few key gists that makes one good at this game:

  1. Pick the third choice for every chat interaction.

  2. Work on Charm and Kindness. Hard.

  3. Use charm and kindness to persue the heroines.

  4. Be a joker.

entry.title: How to use git
entry.content:
git workflow in a nutshell:

  • git checkout -b <feature-branch>

  • work on it

  • git add ... && git commit -m "..."

  • git push -u origin <feature-branch>

  • chat with colleagues and let them merge it for you

entry.content:
Serializer is a class of classes in Django Rest Framework that represents the transformation layer between the JSON object that goes from and to the end client, and the Python dict that goes from and to the end server. It rejects client if the data does not look good, giving a 400.

It happened to make me wonder in what situation does the serializing layer also rejects server's data. Facing this curious problem, my brain stopped and rejects any further thinking and came to the conclusion that serializing is done on server and thus it favours server. It also peacefully accepts the possibility that the previous paragraph was not correct.
